Subject: Transmetal Terror
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=US-ASCII
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable
Content-Disposition: inline
From: "Michael Stadnik" <mstadnik@...>

Up in the high peaks of the mountains nature's peaceful day is interrupted =
by 2 small ships landing in the middle of the forest.  The first ship, a mo=
dified looking stasis pod lands first, followed by what appears to be a sma=
ll supply craft.  As the stasis pod hits the ground first it takes no time =
at all for a DNA scanner to pop out & scan the area for lifeforms.  Minutes=
 later a black transmetal wolverine crawls out of the stasis pod and inspec=
ts the surrounding area to see where it has landed.  After a few moments th=
e animal speaks, "Fracturcon, Maximize!"  The wolverine transforms into a r=
obot and walks over to the second craft, whcih has settled right beside his=
 stasis pod.  "Computer, scan planet for any lifeform readings."  As a smal=
l camera looking device floats out of the small ship and quickly ascends in=
to the sky, Fractucon gets an uneasy feeling that he has walked into a situ=
ation which has more then he is barganing for.  As he contemplates his new =
surroundings the small camera device returns to the ship, "Computer has sca=
nned multiple carbon based lifeforms inhabiting this planet."  Fracturcon's=
 grim mood becomes more uplifting, "Yes....it looks as though there are ple=
ntly of different species here for me to study.  I guess this trip wasn't a=
 waste of time as I thought.  Optimus did say there are a variety of differ=
ent lifeforms to keep me occupied for a long time."  As Fracturcon is about=
 to scan the area for a suitable base camp the computer goes on to say, "Co=
mputer has also scanned multiple transformer sparks on the planet's surface=
."  No sooner had the computer finished making that statement that Fracturc=
on's slight smile on his face turned into a very grim froun.  "What!, how c=
ould there be any transformers left here on this planet?  I thought the Bea=
st Wars were over, from what I was led to believe.  Computer begin individu=
al scan of all transformer sparks on the planet & identify each one.  Estab=
lish com link with my memory core & send all findings directly there."  As =
the computer begins work on it's latest task Fracturcon spots a cave near t=
he top of the mountain he is on.  After scanning the surrounding landscape =
to insure it's defendability Fracturcon sends both his stasis pod & his sup=
ply ship into the cave to begin setting up his lab.  As Fracturcon begins s=
etting up his new "home" he mutters to himself, "Those damn Maximal & Predi=
con warmongers better not bring their damn Beast War around here........cau=
se if they do they'll be in for a big surprise when they see who their new =
neighbor is.....computer begin setting up defense guns & shield."
